meanings.definition: A person who welds metal together.
meanings.sent1: The welders worked diligently to join the metal pieces.
meanings.sent2: The factory hired skilled welders to assemble the machinery.
meanings.sent3: The group of welders joked about creating a metal sculpture of their boss.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the metal pieces was as strong as the unity among the welders.
meanings.sent5: The sparks flew as the welders fused the metal with precision.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'welder'.
meanings.sent1: In the workshop, two welders collaborated on a project.
meanings.sent2: The team of welders completed the construction project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The welders formed a union to advocate for better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: The welders stood together like a solid wall, unyielding to pressure.
meanings.sent5: The sound of welding echoed through the workshop as the welders worked in harmony.
